import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CategoryService } from 'src/app/Services/category.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { constructor(private categoryService: CategoryService) {} setCategory(category: string) { this.categoryService.changeCategory(category); } }
